# Response Templates

## Investment Pass

> "Thanks for reaching out. [CEO] is currently heads down working with clients and is not looking at new deals at this time. We will keep this on file should that change."

## Event Pass

> "Thank you for the invitation. Unfortunately, [CEO] is not available to attend on those dates due to prior commitments. We wish you a successful event."

## Collaboration Pass

> "This is flattering, but [CEO] is not co-collaborating on new projects at this time. We appreciate you thinking of us."

## General "No" (Kindness Rule)

> "Appreciate the response/offer. However, [CEO] is unable to commit to this right now due to [Reason/Strategic Focus]. Best of luck."
